entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
